item.title: Contextual Movie Conversations: Building a Plex MCP Server
item.description: An exploration of building a Plex MCP server using Laravel 12 and Laravel MCP. By integrating Plex playback sessions with OpenSubtitles, I created a system that lets AI assistants understand exactly where I am in a film - perfect for catching up on missed plot points or diving deeper into themes while watching.
